item.description:
Join us for a night of comedy! Seats are selling fast for this event!

If you did not sign up before January 10th and still need tickets, please call the box office or order on line through their website. Tickets are $41.50 per seat plus any applicable handling fees. For anyone else interest in joining us, our seats are listed below so you can try to book a seat with the group. Please make sure you have purchased a ticket before responding yes.

Those of us who booked before January 10th already have tickets in the Upper Left Center Balcony (Row V 301 - 310 and Row W 301 - 310).

Dinner reservations have been made for 6:30 pm at Ping's Garden, 60 Madison Street, Worcester
(508) 791-9577.

This is a dual MeetUp with the Worcester Active Singles Group.
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet in the theatre lobby.
item.name: Bill Cosby
